overview: Summer: A beautiful time of brilliant sunlit days, wonderfully scandalous misadventures and lots of guys wearing even less clothes. Watch Tayte Hanson and Justin Matthews lead a cast of horny dudes seeking that instant gratification that could only be fulfilled during the most sensual time of the year. joined by Pierre Fitch, Connor Maguire and Ricky Roman, this volume is loaded with hot guys frolicking in the sun!
title: Summer's Song
